Ruchi curry powder is the blending of variety of Ruchi blended spices without onion and garlic .It gives vegetable dishes a gently resonant flavor and aroma... Ruchi Garam Masala is an aromatic blend of best whole spices with rich fragrance of cinnamon...

name: bGreen Supergreens & Fruits and Citrus Vitamin C Combo Pack Combo  (200 g + 125 g)
description: bGREEN by MuscleBlaze Supergreens & Fruits is the ultimate power-packed formula to energize, detoxify, and immunize yourself. This supergreen supplement contains the power of 5 natural blends - alkalizing greens, antioxidant blend, fibre blend, immunity blend, & anti-inflammatory blend, which are rich in phytonutrients. This immunity booster for adults has 100% RDA of multivitamins (Vitamin A, B1, B2, B3, B6, B12, C, D3, E, K, Biotin, Folic Acid, Pantothenic Acid), Zinc, and Iron. Enjoy Supergreens & Fruits in a refreshing masala flavour. This bGREEN combo also includes Citrus Vitamin C Immunity Powder that contains a blend of 4 powerful citrus fruits (amla, acerola cherry, lemon, and orange) to boost your immune system. It has 100% RDA of Zinc. Zinc is a potent antioxidant and helps in the better absorption of Vitamin C. This Vitamin C powder for immunity has a natural orange flavour. Both supplements are dairy-free, gluten-free, and contain no artificial sweeteners.

name: Easy Life Garlic Mayonnaise 315g Sandwich Seasoning 40g Roasted Chilli Flakes 65g (Combo of 3) Combo  (Garlic Mayonnaise 315g Sandwich Seasoning 40g Roasted Chilli Flakes 65g (Combo of 3))
description: Easy Life Garlic Mayonnaise salad, sandwich or burger and as a dip with chips or spread for rolls and wraps. Easy Life Chili Garlic Sauce is a zesty combination of farm picked fresh red chilies and flavorful garlic. It's fiery hot and tangy, with a fresh taste. It is used as a dip for Chinese and Thai dishes as well as snacks, and samosa. It can even be used with vegetables for both the health and flavor aspect. Easy Life Sandwich Seasoning is used to add zest and flavor by sprinkling it over the cheese or tomato for sandwiches. It gives warm and aromatic flavor to sandwiches. It has onions, garlic, oregano, coarse pepper, basil and thyme in it to give the sandwiches the taste it needs. Easy Life Chili Flakes are native of Central America, South America, and Caribbean Islands. It has a warm, fiery and tingling hot flavor used more often in Mexican and American cuisines. It can be used with pizza, french fries, pastas, sandwiches and more.
quantity: Garlic Mayonnaise 315g Sandwich Seasoning 40g Roasted Chilli Flakes 65g (Combo of 3)

Our product is light on the digestive system, aids in weight management and improves your heart health too. Use Wheafree Sorghum Sooji to prepare both savoury and sweet items like halwa, kheer, upma, crispy cutlets, laddu and panjiri. Wheafree Gluten Free Flour is one of the few Certified Gluten Free Flours available in the country. It is essential to every kitchen. It is the perfect solution to make gluten free rotis, puris, parathas and much more.

description: Formula 1 Nutritional Shake mix makes a great tasting shake, specifically formulated with all necessary quality soy protein isolate, as Nutritional Food product for nutritional requirements. Packed with vitamins & minerals along with natural herbs, antioxidants and dietary fiber, it provides desired protein and nutrition without overloading unnecessary fat and calories. One serving of Formula 1 shake mix provides 90 kcals of energy. Enjoy Formula 1 shakes once or twice a day along with portion controlled nutrition and exercise to help towards Losing Weight, Energy and Fitness Management and keeping the body fit. Formula 1 Nutritional shake mixes are tested for Glycemic index (GI) and test result confirms it as low GI*F1 Nutritional shake mixes are tested for low GI by Temasek Polytechnic, Singapore. It Is Available in 7 Exciting Flavors like Kulfi, Mango, Strawberry, French Vanilla, Dutch Chocolate, Orange Cream and Banana Caramel Flavor.
